root.name: Ikariam
root.description: Gameplay Ikariam is a browser based game done in real time. You play with hundreds of other players on a sever. you can train troops bulid buldings declare war on other players or trade with them.When you start off in the game you are given control of a small town on one of the islands in the game each island has 15 town slots on it some are empty some are not.

similar_games.game: Age of Empires III: The WarChiefs
StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void
